# encode(to:)

**Instance Method**

Performs encoding of the value using the given encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(to encoder: any Encoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **encoder**: The encoder to write to.

## Decoding and encoding

- **init(from:)**: Creates an instance from the given decoder.
